title: Azir's ult doesn't work on Xin Zhao's dash - plz fix................
body: For the love of god plz fix.

replies.body:
Like Fitzky said, while stationary, it counts as normal terrain now. So any dash that can cross terrain will pass through the wall.
Because god forbid we should have interesting mechanics in a meta that consists entirely of _"ahah duhhhh. **jump. on. enemy. kill.**...  uhhh, did I did good?"_
You mean xin can dash through it? Pretty sure it was changed so it became terrain so champions like xin can actually dash through it now

If you want to report bugs the best place to do so is over on the Report a Bug thread over on NA.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report
